h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: To the left, you can find the Mani Wheel Shrine and a path to the boss, but there's one last section of the fourth level of the prison we need to complete, which unfortunately means going back to the madness. Be sure to unlock the Shrine regardless so you can teleport back to it easily.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 4)'.
The content is as follows:
To the left, you can find the Mani Wheel Shrine and a path to the boss, but there's one last section of the fourth level of the prison we need to complete, which unfortunately means going back to the madness. Be sure to unlock the Shrine regardless so you can teleport back to it easily.
